backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short functional summaries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with Valentine color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls the three-step flow (landing, gifts, final) using React state inside a layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/BalloonRiseAnima: Displays timed rising balloon animations and calls onComplete after 4 seconds.
frontend/src/components/GiftCard.tsx: Gift card component with lock logic, open animation, and expandable content.
frontend/src/components/LayoutShell.tsx: Provides gradient background layout and a footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/components/SafeGeneratedIma: Image loader that falls back to a styled error box when the file is missing.
frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts: Central config defining name, love note text, and filenames for photos.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state and creating AuthClient instances.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark mode, Valentine pink utilities, and several animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/screens/FinalCelebrationScr: Renders final celebration view with a generated couple photo and animated heart decorations.
frontend/src/screens/GiftsScreen.tsx: Implements the three‑gift flow with locking logic, dialogs, balloon animation for gift 3, and photo reveals.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Displays the Valentine question with Yes/No buttons, including an evasive No button using random positioning.
frontend/src/utils/randomPosition.ts: Provides a helper to compute a random on‑screen position for UI elements.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, animations, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, feature list, and overall Valentine app structure and requirements.
